Shock and scratch-resistant watch glass made up of hardened mineral glass, ideal for both indoor and outdoor activities.
Luminous : Luminous Hands & Calibration , is convenient to read the time in the dark

3 ATM Water Resistant
Splash resistant: With the water-resistant material, this quartz wristwatch is elegantly designed to ensure you never miss an adventure activity, but it is only appropriate for rain, water splashes, hand washing, other occasional contact with water, but not for swimming, diving, or bathing.

Accurate time keeping: Branded sports tactical watch movement make its accuracy rate less than 1 second per day. It will always tell you the accurate time on any occasion, business or other important situation. These analog chronograph watch features a very precise Quartz movement along with a date function. Its features are three chronograph sundials that serve as timers.
